data.title: Bass Recorders at The Early Music Shop
data.meta_description: Browse our large selection of plastic and wooden bass recorders. All our bass recorders are keyed with a double bottom key (except renaissance basses) and are even comfortable for players with a modest reach. For expert advice on choosing the best recorder for you, please contact one of our specialists today!
